META_DESCRIPTION: Receive reward for driving adoption of the Neptune Mutual protocol through our grant and bounty initiatives.
META_OG_DESCRIPTION: Receive reward for driving adoption of the Neptune Mutual protocol through our grant and bounty initiatives.
META_TWITTER_DESCRIPTION: Receive reward for driving adoption of the Neptune Mutual protocol through our grant and bounty initiatives.
META_TWITTER_IMAGE_ALT: Neptune Mutual Grants and Bounties Open Graph Banner
Partners that provide value and increase: Partners that provide value and increase adoption and usage of Neptune Mutual will be handsomely compensated for their efforts.
Join the Neptunite community and contrib: Join the Neptunite community and contribute to our goal of defending, safeguarding, and covering DeFi, CeFi, and Metaverse ecosystem against exploitation, hacking, and other forms of online attacks. We strive to strengthen and expand our community outreach and exposure via our community programs. The Neptune Mutual team will promote and reward users that participate in and contribute to the development of the protocol via the various community activities that are presently taking place. Partners that provide value and increase adoption and usage of Neptune Mutual will be handsomely compensated for their efforts.
The protocols that integrate with Neptun: The protocols that integrate with Neptune Mutual protocol and drive our adoption will be eligible for ecosystem and integration grants.
Be on the lookout for the most recent pr: Be on the lookout for the most recent promotions we are offering, such as referral bonuses, discounts, and cash back. For more information, click here.
We are always on the lookout for creativ: We are always on the lookout for creative individuals who can translate our copies, plan meetups, guestpost on our blog, and create copies and videos to spread awareness of our protocol.
Independent security researchers and whi: Independent security researchers and white hat hackers who take part in our bug bounty program get generous rewards. Earn incentives in stablecoins up to $50,000.
